name: dev
postCreateCommand: nvim --headless +PlugInstall +qall 2>/dev/null || true && npm install -g @anthropic-ai/claude-code && sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y socat
postStartCommand: [ -n "$CLAUDE_CREDENTIALS" ] && mkdir -p "$(readlink -f ~/.claude)" && echo "$CLAUDE_CREDENTIALS" > "$(readlink -f ~/.claude)/.credentials.json" && chmod 600 "$(readlink -f ~/.claude)/.credentials.json" && node -e "const f=require('os').homedir()+'/.claude.json';const fs=require('fs');let d={};try{d=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(f))}catch(e){}d.hasCompletedOnboarding=true;d.lastOnboardingVersion='2.1.37';fs.writeFileSync(f,JSON.stringify(d,null,2))" || true
